mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mate (id, email, name, password, job_period, license, valid) VALUES (MATE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{name}, #{password}, #{jobPeriod}, #{license}, 1)
mapper.update: UPDATE mate SET img=#{img}, job_period=#{jobPeriod}, license=#{license}, area=#{area} WHERE email=#{email}
UPDATE mate SET valid=0 WHERE id=#{id}
